text: The Girl Who Believes in Miracles is a 2021 American Christian drama film directed and produced by Richard Correll. The film stars Mira Sorvino, Peter Coyote, Austyn Johnson, and Kevin Sorbo. The film was released on 2 April 2021 by 120 dB Films, Gerson Productions, The Mustard Seed Productions, and Trailmaker Productions. It was distributed by Atlas Distribution Company. The film's plot follows an girl who becomes a national celebrity, as many miracles that have occured are attributed to her. == Plot == When a young girl hears a preacher say faith can be so strong it can move mountains, at a church, she starts praying. One day, she mysteriously brings a dead bird back to life, with a seemingly simple prayer and later becomes a national celebrity as more miracles that have occured are attributed to her. Meanwhile, the girl is dying from an inoperable brain tumor. == Cast == * Austyn Johnson as Sara Hopkins * Mira Sorvino as Binnie Hopkins * Burgess Jenkins as Alex Hopkins * Luke Harmon as Danny Hopkins * Peter Coyote as Sam Donovan * Tommy Rose as Cindy Kramer * Darryl Cox as Pastor Jerry "Mac" Macmillan * Kevin Sorbo as Dr. Ben Riley * Trisha Bradford as Flora Miller * Paul-Mikel Williams as Mark Miller * Stephanie Cood as Theresa Cassillas * Ricardo Hinoa as Alonzo Alvarez * Marisol Vera as Maria Cassillas * David Burkhart as Reporter == Release == The film was released theatrically in the United States on 2 April 2021. === Home media === The film was released on digital platforms on 1 June 2021.
